subject: Baseball
Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Not even the intrusion of the first personal question was enough to wipe the resplendence off Alex Rodriquez’s face at a news conference at the Grand Hyatt in Manhattan.
snippet: Not even the intrusion of the first personal question was enough to wipe the resplendence off Alex Rodriquez’s face at a news conference at the Grand Hyatt in Manhattan.
